item.title: FTC commissioner fired by Trump says her ouster should concern markets
item.description: Trump has worked to overhaul the government by pushing out federal officials and drastically downsizing agencies through the Elon Musk-led DOGE.

item.title: Art created autonomously by AI cannot be copyrighted, federal appeals court rules
item.description: The Supreme Court might be asked to review the case related to the artificial intelligence painting "A Recent Entrance to Paradise."
